title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21 ยง 5007.1 - Monies refunded
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21 ยง 5007.1 - Monies refunded

State Regulations
(a) A
member's accumulated contributions shall consist of all his contributions in
the annuity savings fund, together with credited interest. (b) Monies refunded shall be paid from the
annuity savings fund, except in the following instances where they are paid
from the pension accumulation fund: (1)
where
the employer's share is paid by the member in order to purchase military
service credit under section
243
of the

Military Law and subdivision 10 of section
503
of the

Education Law; (2)
where the
member's accumulated contributions have been deemed abandoned pursuant to
section
531
of the

Education Law. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes
R. & Regs. Tit. 21
ยง
5007.1

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
